Description.Text: Residence Hotel Siloe is a modern 4-star property offering comfortable accommodation in north Milan. Highlights include a medical centre, indoor swimming pool and a gym. Niguarda is a north Milan residential district boasting large open spaces and good public transport links. Nearby places of interest include the spacious public gardens, Parco Nord, the 17th-century Villa Litta and the historic church of Santa Giustina. Niguarda Nord tram stop is located in the vicinity, providing fast and easy access to other popular Milan destinations. The hotel is housed in a modern mid-rise building. Facilities include an indoor swimming pool, gym and a medical centre offering massage, physiotherapy and cosmetic treatments. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Studios are decorated in a modern style. They feature a well-equipped kitchen, small living area and a view of the garden and park. Amenities include air-conditioning and satellite TV. The en-suite bathrooms feature a bathtub with integrated shower. The restaurant offers Italian dishes. Guests can enjoy a range of drinks at the American bar. A buffet breakfast is provided every morning. Free parking is possible onsite.
